author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.1.15 - Fix required fields validation error on rule creation:
- Added clearAllSubPageSettings() to clear orphaned trigger/condition/action settings
- Prevents 'please fill out all required fields' error when sub-page forms were partially filled
- mainPage now clears all sub-page settings on entry to ensure clean validation state

v0.1.14 - Fix child app label not updating in Hubitat Apps list:
- Rules created via UI now properly show their name in the Apps list
- Added app.updateLabel() calls to installed(), updated(), and updateRuleFromParent()
- Previously UI-created rules showed as 'MCP Rule' instead of the actual rule name

v0.1.13 - Fix Hubitat sandbox compatibility:
- Removed private/static modifiers not allowed in Hubitat Groovy sandbox
- Fixed HPM update errors

v0.1.12 - Performance improvements and documentation:
- Added performance warnings to resource-intensive tools (list_devices, get_device_events, list_rules)
- Duration triggers now support minutes/hours units with 2-hour max limit
- Captured states limit now user-configurable (default 20, range 1-100) with automatic cleanup and warnings
- Added new tools: list_captured_states, delete_captured_state, clear_captured_states
- Fixed duration timer state accumulation
- Added Performance Considerations section to README (C7/C8/C8 Pro guidance)

v0.1.11 - Added verification reminders to tool descriptions:
- All state-changing tools now remind AI to verify changes took effect
- list_devices reminds AI to verify device names, not guess

v0.1.10 - Fixed device label returning null:
- send_command and get_attribute now properly return device label in response
- Captures label before operations to avoid Groovy serialization issues

v0.1.9 - Fixed missing condition type validations:
- Added validation for: presence, lock, thermostat_mode, thermostat_state, illuminance, power
- These condition types were documented but validation was missing

v0.1.8 - Fixed duration triggers firing repeatedly:
- After firing, trigger won't fire again until condition goes FALSE first
- Prevents repeated triggering while condition stays true

v0.1.7 - Fixed duration-based triggers:
- device_event triggers with duration now properly wait for condition to stay true
- Uses runIn() timer that cancels if condition becomes false
- No longer triggers on every event when duration is specified

v0.1.6 - Fixed repeat action:
- Now accepts both 'times' and 'count' parameters

v0.1.5 - Fixed capture_state/restore_state:
- States now stored in parent app so any rule can restore states captured by any other rule

v0.1.4 - Added remaining documented actions:
- set_color: Set color (hue, saturation, level) on RGB devices
- set_color_temperature: Set color temperature on CT bulbs
- lock/unlock: Lock or unlock lock devices
- capture_state/restore_state: Save and restore device states
- send_notification: Send push notifications to notification devices
- repeat: Repeat actions N times

v0.1.3 - Major rule engine fixes:
- Fixed delay action: now uses runIn() for proper async delays
- Added variable condition: check local and global variables
- Added device_was condition: check if device has been in state for X seconds
- Added presence, lock, thermostat_mode, thermostat_state, illuminance, power conditions
- Fixed localVariables: now properly passed to rules on create/update
- Added getVariableValue helper for child apps

v0.1.2 - Fixed missing action types in rule engine:
- if_then_else: Conditional branching now works
- cancel_delayed: Cancel pending delayed actions
- set_local_variable: Set rule-scoped variables
- activate_scene: Activate scene devices

v0.1.1 - Pagination for list_devices:
- Added offset/limit parameters to list_devices tool
- Fixes 'detailed=true' failing over Hubitat Cloud (128KB limit)
- Use limit=20-30 with detailed=true for cloud access
- Response now includes total, hasMore, nextOffset for pagination

v0.1.0 - Parent/Child Architecture:
- Rules are now child apps with isolated settings
- Fixed settings cross-contamination between rules

v0.0.6 - Fixed trigger/condition/action save flow.
v0.0.5 - Bug fixes and UI improvements.
v0.0.4 - Added full Rule Engine UI.
v0.0.3 - Initial release.
